page.title: 09Shopping in Ravensworth
page.content: There is a combined Post Office and shop in the village. Here you can buy basic groceries and daily papers as well as the normal post office services such as stamps,money orders,banking and pensions payments. The opening times are :- Monday to Friday 9.00-5.30,Saturday 9.00 to 12.30.Closed for half-day on Tuesdays There are a number of mobile shops/vans which visit the village regularly each week and from which a wide variety of other foodstuffs can be bought. These include :- David Andrews butcher who comes every Tuesday around 9.30a.m. The fishman's van arrives on a Wednesday and also carries eggs and vegetables. Most people who have cars do the bulk of their shopping at supermarkets in Richmond or Darlington.
